DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study explore experience perception District VI pediatric clinician parental vaccine hesitancy vaccine refusal .
DOC.brief_title: Vaccine Hesitancy : A Survey Pediatric Clinicians
DOC.detailed_description: This retrospective , convenience sample , descriptive study . Participants ask complete web-based survey parental vaccine hesitancy/ vaccine refusal . Survey responses primarily categorical . Frequencies average report use group statistic .
DOC.criteria: Members District VI American Academy Pediatrics NonEnglish speaking/reading
